name: Super Dominoes
description:
Super-sized version of the wildly popular Dominoes game! Includes both double 9 and 12 domino sets! This game is jam-packed with many great features, improvements, and different ways to play.

The game of dominoes has been around for centuries… but it has never been this fun to play!!

◆◆◆◆◆ ADDICTIVE FEATURES ◆◆◆◆◆

► Turn-based gameplay with up to 4 friends on the iPhone, iPad, or iPod Touch!
Invite friends to play though Game Center or be automatically matched with new friends.

► Play the Computer!
When you don’t want to wait for it to be your turn or are offline: play the computer! Includes 3 levels of varying difficulty.

► Tons of Ways to Play! That is why it is called Super Dominoes!
Looking for replay-ability? This game has got it! Four different domino games to play, including the old standby blocking game as well as point scoring games like All Fives (aka Muggins), All Threes, and All Fives and Threes! Each game can also be played with either a double 9 or 12 set of dominoes!

► Customizable Domino Sets!
Includes 4 different domino sets with colored and non-color coded pips (dots). Each game

► Achievements!
Over 20 different achievements can be earned. Some are fun and quirky, while others will take some work. Can you collect them all before your friends?

► Leaderboards!
Four different leaderboards to show off your skills!

► Simple Board Navigation!
Intuitive domino game board that requires scrolling in only one dimension so you can quickly see the entire board. Then just drag and drop the dominoes where you want to play them!

► Polished High Resolution Graphics!
Includes great graphics for both retina and non-retina devices, with amazingly sharp graphics on the iPad!

► Universal App!
Play on all your iDevices with just one purchase – this app was specially designed to work on the iPhone, iPod Touch, and the iPad.

► Fun Animations and Sound Effects!
Immersive animations show all of your opponents’ moves, and great sound effects announce when you win or score big points!

◆◆◆◆◆◆◆◆◆◆

What are you waiting for? All of that for a super low price - join in on the fun today!
